channel.title: Comments on: Corona Geek #58 – Accessing Data Remotely Using JSON In Corona SDK

item.title: By: Simon
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description: Hey, this is superb content! Thanks so much for walking through this demo app step by step. Having multiple people discuss the code is great too, as it breaks it down into conversational terms. Thanks again.
item.content:encoded: Hey, this is superb content! Thanks so much for walking through this demo app step by step. Having multiple people discuss the code is great too, as it breaks it down into conversational terms. Thanks again.

item.title: By: Charles McKeever

item.description: Thanks Dave for watching out for other devs. You saved someone hours of valuable time :)
